conversation_history.pr_title: Fix memory check error, implement v1.3.0 Innovation Framework, v1.4.0 + v1.5.0 features (25 tasks), complete v1.6.0 Adaptive Reminders & Health Integration (12 tasks), add v1.7.0 Web Dashboard with No-Code Interface (18 tasks), and start v1.8.0 Knowled...
conversation_history.summary:
The auto-update-memory workflow failed with exit code 128 due to insufficient permissions when attempting to push changes after PR merges.

## Primary Fix: Workflow Permissions

- **`.github/workflows/auto-update-memory.yml`**
  - Add `permissions: contents: write` to `update-memory` job
  - Add explicit `token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}` to checkout step

### Root Cause

```yaml
# Before: No write permission declared
jobs:
  update-memory:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: a

conversation_history.pr_title: Edit my-agent.agent.md for compliance with GitHub Copilot custom agent instructions
conversation_history.summary:
Converts `my-agent.agent.md` from documentation-style markdown to proper GitHub Copilot custom agent format with YAML front matter, following the official GitHub Copilot custom agent specification at https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/reference/custom-agents-configuration.

## Changes Made

### 1. `.github/agents/my-agent.agent.md`
- **Converted file format**: Changed from embedded YAML code block to proper YAML front matter (lines 1-331)
- **Fixed YAML parsing**: Removed internal `---` separato
